Package player

Class Bubble

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
game.Entity
player.Bubble
public class Bubble extends Entity
Class for bubbles. Bubble can be normal, or power (gives an item when popped)

    • Bubble

      public Bubble(int x, int y, int direction, int kind)
      Creates a new bubble with default dimension and speed.
      Parameters:
      x - width position
      y - height positioon
      direction - movement direction
      kind - type of bubble

  • Method Details

    • enemyCollision

      public boolean enemyCollision(Enemy enemy)
      Detects enemy collision. If detected, sets hitten enemy in bubble time.
      Parameters:
      enemy - to check collision with
      Returns:
      true if detected, else false
